name: delayed-web-next
description: This is a tiny and dependency-free web framework for Node.js

scripts.build: tsc && esbuild --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=cjs src/*.ts && esbuild --out-extension:.js=.mjs --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=esm src/*.ts src/**/*
